text: Mbigi, mbe muunga ŋaar khare, mbe tari tɨrga. Mbe maaŋ muuŋv, mbe zazera Krais khothivɨv, wari won ntuur ana nɨɨŋv, ana nɨman ŋgaravra kɨv, mbe guigira wari won ndavir harigi gumgi gu mbigi nɨɨŋv tɨvir vhuuin muunga, Fhe Bakɨme taagi mbe ndigirga. 2.15 Kha vezar mbe Grikar kaman suaŋgi kameŋ tuituigiap hɨgi fhuvara.
